message: Let's start with a simple offer, Bob. I take 60 and you get 40.  It's in your best interest to accept now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I think we can do better than your initial offer. Considering the 5% inflation, accepting this now would be wise.
Bob, it's clear we both want a larger piece of the pie. I'm willing to be slightly more generous this round, but the clock is ticking. Another round and inflation will hit us again.
We're both losing value with each round. This is a fair compromise, and I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle. Let's end this before the value drops further.
